alert.note: Alert for Fremont (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 31 at 10:03PM MDT until July 31 at 10:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN FREMONT COUNTY... At 1003 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Penrose, or 24 miles southwest of Colorado Springs, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Fremont County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
